channel.title: Wondering if it was possible
channel.description: Just wondering if it was possible to make a little program that starts up when the computer boots and if you dont press a certain key combo (like when it comes to login screen for xp pro) then it would shutdown and give a little message. It would help bunches if this existed already lol so im just wondering if its possible so maybe I could work some magic with the little programming i kno :P

item.title: Wondering if it was possible
item.dc:creator: @marauder1 marauder1
item.description:
@marauder1 wrote:

if you want to block him, set a bios password for him.

Read full topic

item.title: Wondering if it was possible
item.dc:creator: @MoO MoO
item.description:
@MoO wrote:

not a virus, I have an annoying friend who is always tryin to get on my comp when im not here and id just like that to disscourage him, anyways if you read i already said i wanted it too load on boot (so its invisable)

Read full topic

item.title: Wondering if it was possible
item.dc:creator: @marauder1 marauder1
item.description:
@marauder1 wrote:

why do you need that for?
i think its possible tho, you can write a c program which calls shutdown -s -t 0 -c “Unauthorised Access” unless you press a certain key combo. But then again, that person can just close the exe. So, i think the best way is a run on boot which starts as an invisible process. However, if you are trying to use it as a virus, the best way to delete it is to safemode->del

Read full topic
